titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before his Maiesty, on Tuesday the nineteenth of Iune, at Wansted. Anno Dom. 1621. By D. Laud Deane of Glocester, one of his Maiesties chaplaines in ordinary. Printed by commandement
titleStmt.author: Laud, William, 1573-1645.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by F. K[ingston] for Matthew Lownes, dwelling in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Bishops head,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Bishops head
